data.prayer: Father, encourage the 11 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pamandzi, Mayotte
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 11 believers in Pamandzi, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 will die without Jesus in the next month in Pamandzi, Mayotte.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, 11,500 people live in the state of Pamandzi. Please, give them 2 new simple churches this year.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Pamandzi, Mayotte. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Pamandzi, Mayotte.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Pamandzi
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Pamandzi who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Pamandzi, Mayotte has a population of 11,500.

We estimate Pamandzi has 11 people who might know Jesus, 176 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 11,313 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 1,045 neighbors who need Jesus.
